comment: quite different but delicious! Nice party appetizer Makes several dozen
In bowl place minced onion, avocados, salt and pepper, corriander and lemon juice and mash and mix with a fork. Stir in chopped nuts and shredded cheese.Mixture should be firm enough to roll into a small balls. Coat in flour and then in bread crumbs.
Fry the balls in hot fat 350 degrees ( several inches of oil in heavy duty skillet ) until golden on all sides. Drain on absorbent paper and serve hot. Quantity depends on the size of the balls ( walnut size is fine ). Note: use any mild cheese or any kind of nut if desired.
